name: postcss-rpx-transform

1.0.0.name: postcss-rpx-transform

scripts.dev: yarn clean && yarn dts && cross-env NODE_ENV=development rollup -cw
scripts.build: yarn clean && yarn dts && cross-env NODE_ENV=production rollup -c

1.0.1.name: postcss-rpx-transform
1.0.1.description: Let's make rpx great again! convert rpx (responsive-pixel) to px,rem,vw

scripts.dev: yarn clean && yarn dts && cross-env NODE_ENV=development rollup -cw
scripts.build: yarn clean && yarn dts && cross-env NODE_ENV=production rollup -c
